radiographic_examinations.findings: There is thickening of the sigmoid colon with surrounding inflammatory changes, consistent with sigmoid diverticulitis. A 3.1 x 3.7 cm phlegmonous fluid collection interposed between the sigmoid colon and bladder with marked bladder wall thickening.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The phlegmonous collection has decreased in size in the interval and is less fluid-like compared to the prior study.
